column1: Gửi thông tin control thiết bị IOT

column3:
- HueChannelValue
    Range (0 - 3600)
- SaturationChannelValue
    Range (0 - 1000)
- ValueChannelValue
    Range (0 - 1000)
0 (disable lock), 1(enable lock), 65532(enable lock after time input)
0 (AC AUTO), 1 ( AC COOLING ), 2 (AC DRY), 3(AC HEATING), 4(AC FAN)

- OnOffValue
     0(OFF), 1(ON)
- ModeValue
     0 (AC AUTO), 1 ( AC COOLING ), 2 (AC DRY), 3(AC HEATING), 4(AC FAN)
- TempValue
     (15-30)
- FanValue
     0(Auto), 1(Low), 2(Normal), 3(High), 4(Max), 255(Custom)
- SwingValue
     0(Auto), 255 (SwingOff),

case NUM_0 = 0
  case NUM_1 = 1
  case NUM_2 = 2
  case NUM_3 = 3
  case NUM_4 = 4
  case NUM_5 = 5
  case NUM_6 = 6
  case NUM_7 = 7
  case NUM_8 = 8
  case NUM_9 = 9
  case POWER = 10
  case POWER_ON = 11
  case POWER_OFF = 12
  case CHANNEL_UP = 13
  case CHANNEL_DOWN = 14
  case CHANNEL_LIST = 15
  case VOL_UP = 16
  case VOL_DOWN = 17
  case MUTE = 18
  case OK = 19
  case UP = 20
  case DOWN = 21
  case LEFT = 22
  case RIGHT = 23
  case MENU = 24
  case BACK = 25
  case HOME = 26
  case EXIT = 27
  case INPUT = 28
  case PLAY = 29
  case STOP = 30
  case PAUSE = 31
  case MODE = 32
  case SLEEP = 60
  case SWING = 61
  case SWING_MODE = 62
  case FAN_SPEED = 63

  case FAN_SPEED_DOWN = 65
  case TIMING = 66

  case LOW = 256
